returns.existing: True if the given lottery name exists, false otherwise

params.name: Lottery name to retrieve winners for

NameAlreadyInUse(string).notice: Raised upon encountering an already-existing lottery name

NotYetCreated(string).notice: Raised upon encountering a non-existing lottery name

NumberOfWinnersMustBeAtMostNumberOfPlaye.notice: Raised upon encountering a number of winners greater than the corresponding population

NumberOfWinnersMustBePositive().notice: Raised upon encountering a 0-size selection (ie. the number of winners)

PlayersMustBeNonEmpty().notice: Raised upon encountering an empty players list

create(string,(bytes32,uint256,string[]).notice: Create a new lottery with the given configuration

exists(string).notice: Determine whether the given lottery name exists

get(string).notice: Retrieve an existing lottery by name

simulate((bytes32,uint256,string[])).notice: Simulate the execution of the given lottery configuration

userdoc.notice: Blockchain-based Lottery Implementation This Lottery implementation uses iterated Keccak256 as the underlying RNG.
